body.name: Dark Grey Convertible Sectional, Modern Linen Fabric Upholstered L-Shaped Couch with Armrest Pockets 3-Seat Sofa with Reversible Storage Ottoman for Living Room Small Space Apartment
features: 【CLASSIC LOOK】—Minimalist look that can be combined with a variety of home styles. The 3-seater sofa and ottoman are made of breathable skin-friendly linen fabric and are equipped with high-density foam cushions, cushions can't easily deform and can provide comfortable and soft support. You can relax in the living room or watch TV.

【STURDY & DURABLE】—Made of a sturdy wooden frame and high-quality metal for improved stability and durability, this 3-seater sofa can easily support up to 800 pounds, 6 legs provide excellent stability, ensuring that this linen fabric sofa furniture will stand the test of time, and you can count on our sofa.

【FREE COMBINATION】—You can freely DIY and realize a multifunctional recliner design that provides maximum comfort. Small space reversible sectional sofa couch, making the most of your apartment or studio space, whether in the living room, apartment or office, is the perfect complement for a more relaxing time with your family.

【EXTRA STORAGE】—The 3-seater sofa armrests have large side pockets on the sides, providing plenty of space for magazines, remote controls, and more. The additional storage function under the ottoman is not only a mecca for children's toys, but also for storing blankets and various items to make the room look neat and clean.

【EASY ASSEMBLY】—The 3-seat sofa size is 78"(D)*29"(W)*33"(H), the ottoman size is 25"(D)*23"(W)*17.3"(H). Effectively packed in a box. Equipped with detailed instructions and kits, anyone can easily install it in less than 20 minutes. If you have any questions after purchasing this product, please feel free to contact us. We are happy to serve you.
body.description: Comfort is a future-proof elementTrust us, choosing this affordable, comfortable and chic sofa is one of the better decisions you made this yearMULTI-PURPOSEThis linen sofa is perfect for reading, watching TV, napping, playing games, suitable for bedrooms, living rooms, apartments, offices, dormitories, etc. It is a versatile and economical necessity in your homeEASY CARESimply use a vacuum cleaner or a clean cloth to remove the dust. All seat cushions and backrests are zippers for easy cleaning. The high metal legs can easily allow the robot vacuum cleaner to pass without worrying about dust on the floor.REMOVE & STORAGE OTTOMANThe movable recliner can be fixed to any seat, left, right or center. You can place a footrest according to your preference and space. The additional storage function under the seat allows you to store not only children's toys, but also various items, making the room look neat and clean.STORAGE BAGSSide storage pockets on both sides of the sofa keep everything within easy reach, organized but not visible! Use it to store your TV remote, phone, glasses, or the book you want to finish.THOUGHTFUL DESIGNThe lower side of the three-seat sofa and the lower side of the ottoman are specially designe

productInformation.value: 3.6 3.6 out of 5 stars 34 ratings 3.6 out of 5 stars

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #126,325 in Home & Kitchen (See Top 100 in Home & Kitchen) #15 in Living Room Furniture Sets

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Affordable & easy to build as a single woman
reviews.reviewText: The couch was easy to assemble: it was a one-woman type of built. I was very pleased with the end result, as it compliments my living room well. It does not take up a lot of space, and it is worth the value price, so I highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This item does not look like what is shown in the picture. After putting it together, it looks very cheap. Not worth the money nor the time to put it together

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Not bad for a cheaper couch. It's definitely not a sink in, relax kind of couch but it's fine for just sitting in if you're not home much. Easy to put together and seems like it's at least easy to clean as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great and comfortable couch
reviews.reviewText: The couch looks great in my business. The color is perfect. It’s comfy with a modern look. It was very easy to assemble. It came with all the tools you need to put it together. It was nicely vacuumed sealed so the box was pretty compact when it arrived. My mom said it’s very comfortable. I would definitely recommend this couch to anyone looking for a great value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not enough support
reviews.reviewText: The back cushions for your back don’t have enough support very little fill in them . It’s very uncomfortable

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I shouldn’t have expected much for the price, but the photos are misleading. The couch isn’t very sturdy at all and the cushions are super thin and flat. It looks and feels really cheap. The only good part about it is the ottoman.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great quality for the price, all came in 1 box which was surprising to me. However,I received a beige sofa & it is stained EVERYWHERE I am SO disappointed.. hoping I can get the stains out..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars You get your moneys worth
reviews.reviewText: For the price paid the couch is alright. It fit great in my tiny apartment. It was very easy to build, I did it alone. I only wish the back piece was larger or more like a complete base not just a covered metal frame. Otherwise, it’s cute
